---
title: "GAM analysis angle and origin distance with MLE new fitness data"
output: html_notebook
---
  
  
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(tidyr)
library(lubridate)
library(nlme)
library(performance)
library(mgcv)
library(naniar)

set.seed(12345)
```

```{r}
static_data <- read.csv("../data/fitness_df.csv", header=T)
static_tb <- as_tibble(static_data)
```


```{r}
change_gam_1 <- gam (Mean_Memory ~ Mean_Sine_Angle_Diff_Static+Mean_Origin_Distance_Static,  data=static_tb)
change_gam_1$coefficients

summary.gam(change_gam_1)
check_collinearity(change_gam_1)
```
